Keez est une application de rencontre, mais surtout une Intelligence Artificielle entrain√©e √† calculer la compatibilit√© entre deux utilisateurs, en se basant sur leur psychologie, leurs valeurs, leurs aspirations, leur personnalit√©, leurs passions et leur histoire.

L'entreprise :
L‚Äôurgence climatique est une course que l‚Äôon peut encore gagner si l‚Äôon choisit d‚Äô√™tre un acteur du changement !En Europe, la mobilit√© est responsable pour plus de 30% des √©missions de CO2 et doit diminuer de 92% d‚Äôici 2050 pour limiter le r√©chauffement climatique √† 1,5¬∞C.Notre mission ? At Six Values, we are more than just a B2B betting and gaming technology company ‚Äî we are creators of experiences that change people‚Äôs moods for the better.We work with a range of global client brands - are we are in ‚Äúscale up‚Äù mode, hiring the best and most highly motivated, fast working, bureaucracy hating, ‚ÄúI want to win but I‚Äôm not afraid to fail‚Ä¶‚Äù, team players. We provide B2B support services to multiple technology and gaming partners, we believe in the free market, and want to hear from the best of the best.
ROLE SUMMARY:The SEO Team Lead will be responsible for owning and executing the organic search strategy across multiple B2C online casino brands. Reporting directly to the Head of SEO, this individual will manage a team of SEO specialists, collaborate cross-functionally with content, product, design, and development teams, and ensure all websites achieve strong organic visibility, traffic growth, and sustainable rankings in highly competitive iGaming markets.
The ideal candidate is both strategic and hands-on ‚Äî with deep knowledge of technical SEO, on page SEO, off page SEO and SERP performance optimization across multilingual and multi-regional casino domains.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:Strategy & ExecutionExecute SEO strategies tailored to individual casino brands across target geosOversee keyword research, competitor analysis, and content gap identificationCreate and drive content strategies for acquisition, retention, and long-tail traffic growthOwn the on-page, off-page, and technical SEO roadmaTechnical SEOManage site audits and technical health monitoring (crawlability, indexation, Core Web Vitals,etc.)Work closely with the Tech Team on site migrations, page speed, mobile-first indexing, structured data, etc.Oversee technical SEO implementation across CMSs and custom platformsTeam & Stakeholder ManagementLead and mentor a team of SEO executives/specialistsCollaborate with content, design, dev, CRM, and paid media teams for integrated campaignsProvide regular performance reporting to senior leadership with clear insights and actionsPerformance MonitoringMonitor rankings, traffic, crawl stats, and SERP features using tools like GSC, GA4, Ahrefs, and SEMrushTrack and analyze KPIs: organic sessions, conversions, rankings, link growth, and content performanceEnsure ongoing SEO compliance with regulatory and jurisdictional requirementsSEO for iGamingImplement SEO best practices with consideration for responsible gaming and regulatory requirementsMonitor for algorithm updates, penalties, and prepare defensive/offensive strategies accordingly
SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:Must-Have Skills:Proven experience in SEO leadership roles within iGaming, online casino, sportsbook, or related nichesDeep understanding of technical SEO (JavaScript SEO, schema, CWV, crawl budgets)Strong content strategy knowledge (keyword clustering, topical authority, SERP intent optimization)Hands-on experience with tools: Google Search Console, GA4, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, Sitebulb, Looker/Data StudioLeadership & Communication2‚Äì5 years of experience managing SEO teams and/or cross-functional projectsStrong project management skills and ability to prioritize tasks across brands and marketsExcellent communication skills to work with devs, SEOs, native writers, and other executives.Industry & Market KnowledgeDeep familiarity with SEO in regulated markets (UKGC, MGA, Curacao, etc.)Experience managing multilingual and geo-targeted sites (hreflang, geo-IP,ccTLDs/subfolders)Understanding of affiliate SEO, bonus strategy content, and SERP monetization methodsBonus SkillsFamiliarity with server-side rendering (SSR), headless CMS environments, or CDNsKnowledge of AI tools for content and SEO productivityData literacy ‚Äì ability to analyze large datasets and extract actionable insights
OTHER:You are detail focused but able to see the ‚Äúbig picture‚Äù, you can remove barriers, and move forward at pace.Encourages communication and collaboration across the business, team and stakeholders in order to build strong relationships and develop cross functional working. A trusted advisor who always delivers on promises.Work independently, take appropriate responsibility for actions and make sensible decisions.Be self motivated as you will encounter many challenges and opportunities.
WHY JOIN US:Be part of a fast-growing, innovative company with a clear vision and mission.Work in a dynamic, collaborative environment that values speed, clarity, and decisiveness.Take ownership of a critical role with the opportunity to make a significant impact on the business.Join a team of highly motivated, talented professionals who are passionate about delivering exceptional experiences.
About sixvaluesOur vision is to elevate the mood of people everywhere, making every interaction more engaging, rewarding, and memorable. Through cutting-edge technology and a real commitment to excellence, we aim to revolutionize how people connect with digital experiences, transforming the world of betting and gaming technology.Our mission is simple yet ambitious: to be a fast-moving, highly efficient tech company that brings joy and excitement to players by delivering top-tier solutions for operators. From website and application development to data analytics and payment systems, everything we do is designed to create seamless, thrilling experiences for our partners and their customers.

We are looking for an experienced and results-driven E-commerce Executive to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia (Remote). The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and optimizing our online sales channels, including our website, third-party marketplaces, and digital marketing campaigns. This role requires a deep understanding of ecommerce platforms, consumer behavior, and digital marketing strategies to drive traffic, increase conversions, and maximize revenue.
As an E-commerce Specialist, you will be responsible for the following activities:Manage and optimize ecommerce platforms and online storefrontsDevelop and execute digital marketing strategies to drive traffic and salesMonitor and analyze website performance and user behaviorEnsure accurate product listings, pricing, and inventory managementCollaborate with marketing and product teams on promotions and campaignsConduct A/B testing and implement conversion rate optimization strategiesTrack and report on key performance indicators (KPIs)Stay updated on ecommerce trends and best practicesCoordinate with customer service to improve user experienceManage third-party marketplace accounts (e.g., Amazon, Noon)
Requirements will be:Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Marketing, Business, or related field3+ years of experience in ecommerce & digital marketingProficiency with ecommerce platforms like Amazon, Noon, or similarStrong analytical and problem-solving skillsExperience with SEO, SEM, and email marketingFamiliarity with Google Analytics and other reporting toolsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsAbility to manage multiple projects and meet deadlinesDetail-oriented with a focus on accuracyKnowledge of HTML/CSS is a plus

√Ä propos

Nous recherchons une personne passionn√©e par le football, le sport, l'√©ducation, l'impact et les nouvelles technologie :
Exp√©rience confirm√©e en acquisition : vous justifiez de 3 √† 5 ann√©es d‚Äôexp√©rience en acquisition web, avec la gestion d‚Äôun budget annuel d‚Äôau moins 6 chiffres. Cela dit, chacun √©volue √† son rythme : nous recrutons avant tout sur vos comp√©tences, votre exp√©rience et l‚Äôimpact que vous pouvez avoir chez Formations FootballExpert des mod√®les d‚Äôabonnement : vous avez d√©j√† su ma√Ætriser avec succ√®s l‚Äô√©quilibre du CAC et du payback sur au moins un produit freemium-to-paidInnovant et pragmatique : vous n‚Äôavez pas peur de cr√©er des prototypes et de tirer parti de l‚ÄôIA pour am√©liorer votre productivit√©Data-driven : √† l‚Äôaise avec SQL, Looker, Amplitude (ou √©quivalents), vous concevez des A/B tests, refusez de vous limiter √† un seul mod√®le d‚Äôattribution et mettez en perspective vos r√©sultats avant d‚ÄôagirRapide & Transparent : vous croyez que la vitesse fait la diff√©rence et que le feedback nourrit de meilleures d√©cisions ; la franchise radicale est votre mode par d√©fautEsprit d‚Äôownership : quand le ROAS baisse, vous diagnostiquez, r√©allouez et corrigez ‚Äî sans attendre d‚ÄôautorisationBilingue fran√ßais / anglais : vous √©voluerez dans un environnement international o√π la moiti√© de notre budget d‚Äôacquisition est investi hors de France

Un environnement de travail dynamique favorisant l‚Äô√©volution professionnelle.L‚Äôopportunit√© de participer √† l‚Äô√©volution de l‚Äô√©ducation et de la formation dans le football.L‚Äôint√©gration au sein d‚Äôune √©quipe jeune et passionn√©e (+10 personnes).

Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

Optimisation Manager for Holiday Projects (Freelance Contract)
About the role:The Optimisation Manager will play a pivotal role in supporting the growth of Conversion Rate Optimisation (CRO) activities. This position is centred around driving the experiment programme focusing on generating incremental revenue and enhancing margin growth. The individual will work across the website and app, collaborating with teams to implement hypotheses and evaluate their effectiveness, as well as leveraging personal initiative to maximise product build efficiencies. We do a lot of AB testing and have had a contractor in to plan and build the tests. This will focus more on the analytics side of things.
Key responsibilities:‚Ä¢ Support holiday sales by collaborating with Learning and Development, Search, and Checkout squads.‚Ä¢ Ideate, plan, build, and analyse site optimisation experiments to improve user experience and increase conversions.‚Ä¢ Manage the execution and assessment of A/B testing initiatives to validate hypotheses.‚Ä¢ Develop insights from data analysis to influence future optimisation strategies.
Role requirements:‚Ä¢ Proven experience in creating and executing experiments using A/B testing tools.‚Ä¢ Proficient in web behaviour and experiment analysis with web analytics tools, particularly Amplitude.‚Ä¢ Strong analytical skills and ability to interpret complex data sets to drive decision-making.‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills to articulate findings and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
